nodes.text: James "Jim" Kevin Ward (born May 19, 1959) had been a voice actor for over 20 years. He was credited for voicing "Angry Fan, Coruscant Male 3, Alien Guard, Gungan Jailer, and Soldier 7" in the Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace video game.
His non–Star Wars work includes cartoons like The Fairly Odd-Parents, Mighty Mouse: The New Adventures and Xyber 9, as well as video-game voice work for EverQuest II, Call of Duty and many others.
In 2021, Ward was diagnosed with both COVID-19 and Alzheimer's. He currently resides at the Silverado Beverly Place Memory Care Community in Los Angeles, CA.
